memberdef.name: UPROCMAX
memberdef.initializer: 3 /* number of usermode processes (not including master proc and system daemons */

memberdef.name: BUS_TIMESCALE
memberdef.initializer: 0x10000024 /* How many clock ticks per microsecond */

memberdef.name: DEV_USED_INTS
memberdef.initializer: 5 /* Number of ints reserved for devices: 3,4,5,6,7 */

memberdef.name: DEV_PER_INT
memberdef.initializer: 8 /* Maximum number of devices per interrupt line */

memberdef.name: INT_LOWEST
memberdef.initializer: 3 /* minimum interrupt number used by real devices */

memberdef.name: ENTRYLO_ACCESSED
memberdef.initializer: 0x00000080 /* NEW flag, not in the specs */

memberdef.name: CR
memberdef.initializer: 0x0a /* carriage return as returned by the terminal */
